mapper.select: select content_id contentId, content_type_id contentTypeId, title, addr1 addr, first_image img from attraction_info where ${keyword} like concat('%', #{content}, '%') LIMIT ${LIMIT} OFFSET ${page}

select content_id contentId, content_type_id contentTypeId, title, addr1 addr, first_image img from attraction_info where ${keyword} like concat('%', #{content}, '%') and content_type_id=cast(#{code} as signed) LIMIT ${LIMIT} OFFSET ${page}
select count(*) from member_interest where member_id=#{memberId} and content_id=#{contentId}
select count(*) from attraction_interest where content_id=#{contentId}

update attraction_interest set interest_count = interest_count-1 where content_id=#{contentId}
